summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Seattle Department of Parks and Recreation, accepting $82,000 from the Seattle Housing Authority (SHA) under the 1995 Public Housing Drug Elimination Grant Program and authorizing agreements with SHA for Teen Life Enhancement Programs at Yesler Terrace and High Point Community Centers; increasing the expenditure allowances in the Department's 1995 budget; and making reimbursable appropriation from the Park Fund, all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
